en:
Exist in two variants - basic and sturdy.
Basic one can't be broken, sturdy breaks after {barrier_sturdy_health} hits.

Barriers don't count towards level completion.

Exist in two variants - basic and sturdy.
Basic blocks break after {block_health} hit, sturdy ones after {block_sturdy_health}.

Destroy all to complete a level.

Increases by 1 for every {multiplier_combo_step} destroyed elements, up to {multiplier_max_combo}.\nGrabbing difficulty increasing pickups (small/fast ball, smaller paddle) also increases multiplier independent of combo.\nMax score multiplier: x{multiplier_max}.
Screen shake effect used during gameplay.
